name: Paper Wars [Draft 1.0]
description:
A proof of concept for a game I've been trying to make in UDK.

*bugs

-ap limiter on consecutive attack is not working properly, may end up in suicide if player tries to spam attack before ap regenerates to a safe level.

-cannot go fullscreen until player reaches main menu again via winning/losing.

v1.1 here : http://yoruno.itch.io/paper-wars-draft-11
